pfe.title: Ensimag Final-Year Project
desc: Six-month end-of-studies internship within the ELIPSE team (IRIT ‚Äì HCI).
Development of a multi-screen collaboration system in mixed reality using Unity/Netcode and C# on the Meta Quest 3.
Contribution to the network integration to support at least two users.
Participation in team seminars and meetings.

gl.title: Ensimag Software Engineering Project
desc: Design and development of a compiler in Java for the D√©ca language.
Compliance with a professional-like requirements specification.
Task distribution within the team and documentation writing.

site.title: Personal Website Development Project
desc: Website developed using React and Next.js.
Back-end for emails and data handling.
Focus on visual aesthetics and coherence.

ai.title: AI Internship Project
desc: Exploration and implementation of PINNs (Physics-Informed Neural Networks) in Python with PyTorch.
Application to solving the Fourier equation.
Comparison of the PINN output with the theoretical solution.
Experimental work and model performance analysis.
